title: 领地
author: w1330666985
txt_content: 领地插件装了汉化包，还是英文，怎么办？

replies.author: robbit
replies.txt_content:
打开领地插件的配置文件[Residence]中的config文件把

Global:
    # This loads the <language>.yml file in the Residence Language folder
    # All Residence text comes from this file. (NOT DONE YET)
    Language: Chinese
    # Wooden Hoe is the default selection tool for Residence.
    # You can change it to another item ID listed here: http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Data_values
    SelectionToolId: 290
    # This determins which tool you can use to see info on residences, default is String.
    # Simply equip this tool and hit a location inside the residence and it will display the info for it.
    InfoToolId: 287
彩色的自改成我这样子就好了，不会就找QQ1811753618

replies.author: robbit
replies.txt_content:
robbit 发表于 2015-3-22 20:38
打开领地插件的配置文件[Residence]中的config文件把

Global:
打错了一个字。。。。。。字==
领地要汉化干嘛，表示我看得懂，从来不用汉化
